name: Jeanne d'Arc
description:
A Tale Where History Meets Fantasy
Enter the 15th century, as France and England battle during the Hundred Years' War. A mysterious and powerful armlet appears on the wrist of a young crusader named Jeanne. Commanded by an oracle from above, Jeanne wields the armlet to turn back the dark invading army to save her homeland once and for all.
• Crusade through French villages and battle mythical creatures.
• Command 14 heroic characters in a quest to recapture the homeland.
• Engage in unique team-based attack and defense schemes.
www.jda-psp.com
